long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension meant for those working in customer support or any role where you might want to create a set of text templates to quickly access.

Please note that this extension is a rough first version, we did not pay any attention to design.
None of the text is sent to servers, it is all stored locally. So make sure to create backups using the provided functionality to prevent data loss.
